snippet: A group of police officers became sudden celebrities by covering “Get Lucky,” Daft Punk’s Grammy Award-winning record of the year, shortly before the opening ceremony of the Olympics.
abstract: Online video of Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs Choir singing Daft Punk's hit pop song Get Lucky before opening ceremony of Winter Olympic Games quickly goes viral.
lead_paragraph: A group of police officers became sudden celebrities by covering “Get Lucky,” Daft Punk’s Grammy Award-winning record of the year, shortly before the opening ceremony of the Olympics.
